name: Khao Shong 3 in 1 Cappuccino
description: Khao Shong Coffee Mix 3in1 Cappuccino Coffee brings you a perfect cup of lusciously & authentically foamy Cappuccino as if you have a personal Barista with you everywhere you go. Moreover, Khao Shong Coffee Mix 3in1 Cappuccino Less sugar has sugar less than 45% compared with Khao Shong Coffee Mix 3in1 Cappuccino. *Images for illustration purpose only, Product recieved may vary.
